    • DeserializeObject

      public static Object DeserializeObject(byte[] bytes)
      Turn an array of bytes into an object.
      Parameters:
      bytes - The array of bytes to deserialize.
      Returns:
      The resulting object, or null if no object could be created.

    • SplitObjectToByteChunks

      public static ByteChunk[] SplitObjectToByteChunks(Object obj)
      Split an object into chunks of bytes, each chunk contains 64 bytes.
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to split.
      Returns:
      An array of ByteChunk objects.

    • CompileByteChunks

      public static Object CompileByteChunks(ByteChunk[] chunks)
      Turn an array of byte chunks in an object.
      Parameters:
      chunks - The byte chunks to compile.
      Returns:
      The resulting object, or null if one could not be created from the data.

    • CombineByteArrays

      public static byte[] CombineByteArrays(byte[] a, byte[] b)
      Combines byte arrays a and b. Array b is overlaid onto a from the end of a. For example, let a = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5], b = [6, 7, 8] The result will be [1, 2, 6, 7, 8]
      Parameters:
      a - Array a
      b - Array b
      Returns:
      The combined array
